title: PCB denies report of rift between players and coach Misbah Ul Haq
text:
The Pakistan cricket board (PCB) on Wednesday denied speculated rift between some players and head coach Misbah Ul Haq over lack of discipline during training.

It was earlier reported by some news channels that Misbah Ul Haq has expressed disappointment with the attitude of some Pakistani players during the training session, including the captain of the team Sarfaraz Ahmed, Wahab Riaz, Imad Wasim and Haris Sohail.

The Board, however, has strongly denied the claims, saying Misbah do not have any conflict with the players.

Pakistan recently suffered a whitewash against Sri Lanka in the three-game T20I series at home ground after which Misbah stated that the series loss against a second-string Sri Lanka has opened his eyes to the fact that there is something seriously wrong with the country’s cricket system.
